changeSet.createView: SELECT p.id, (p.first_name::text || ' '::text) || p.last_name::text AS full_name, p.date_of_birth, p.phone, a2.start_date FROM patient p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.patient_id, min(a.start_date) AS start_date FROM appointment a WHERE a.start_date > now() GROUP BY a.patient_id) a2 ON a2.patient_id = p.id;
